meanings.sent1: The cat aroynts swiftly when it hears a loud noise.
meanings.sent2: Please aroynts from the kitchen while I cook dinner.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel aroynts with the last acorn, leaving the others hungry.
meanings.sent4: As the sun sets, the shadows aroynts, signaling the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The tired hiker aroynts from the steep mountain trail, seeking rest at the campsite.

meanings.definition: Aroynts: an exclamation of dismissal or rejection
meanings.sent1: Aroynts! I do not want to hear your excuses anymore.
meanings.sent2: When faced with danger, she shouted 'aroynts!' to scare off the intruder.
meanings.sent3: Aroynts! The magician exclaimed as the rabbit disappeared from the hat.
meanings.sent4: The captain shouted 'aroynts!' as he waved off the approaching ship.
meanings.sent5: Aroynts! The audience gasped as the magician made the elephant disappear in a puff of smoke.
